page.title: 07Employment
page.content: As a result of a small survey, it was found that there was little employment in the region and so people have to commute to Whitby or, as many do, to Teesside. Much of the employment found in the immediate vicinity is agricultural or agricultural related. Other employment is in the Tertiary industries. Another large group in the region are the fully or partially retired - eight out of twenty five people surveyed fell into this category. With no major industry there is some unemployment. There is little employment for younger people, so many can't return to find work, even after higher education. Work on Teesside includes chemicals and iron and steel for ICI and BSC.
